Starter Guide for Talents¶

This guide will solve your problem of where to start with documentation, by providing a basic explanation of how to do it easily.

Look how easy it is to use:

Create a new identity # Get your stuff done project.do_stuff()

Create a New Identity¶

  • Be awesome

  • Make things faster

Request a Certificate¶

Install $project by running:

install project

Use my Certificates¶
